title: Which is one BTS song that I should be listening to right away? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text:
DDAENG  DDAENG is what your 2006 diss track playlist *wishes* it could be. Edgy, catchy, intelligent, DDAENG is everything. I wouldn’t consider myself to be the world’s *biggest* rap fan but boy oh boy does DDAENG hit the right nerve! I think you’ll have a special appreciation for it if you can understand Korean/know a bit about Korean culture! I’ve heard there is some clever wordplay and motif use! But it’s still quite impactful even for a foreigner! The word “Ddaeng” in and of itself doesn’t have much meaning, but it’s almost like a filler word for different situations. It could be the “buzzer” sound “ddaeng” when someone is saying your wrong. It could be like a Mic Drop “boom” moment. And it could be a few other things as well. But I think the chameleon-like attributes for ddaeng makes the song cooler and more unique! It also takes on a type of rap called “stutter rap” which can be seen in RM’s verse. It’s considered to be somewhat challenging from what I’ve heard since you have to keep on beat. The lyrics are so cool! I think every verse is gonna hit people differently but a few of my favorites are: “1–8, 1–3, 3–8, Ddaeng”The first part of the chorus says “1–8, 1–3, 3–8, Ddaeng” which is in reference to a well known Korean card game where a 3–8 card combination is superior which is just so cool in my opinion!Also soooo catchy!“This success, uhIs all thanks to you, uhIsn't it funny, isn't it funny? yeDon't you feel dumbfounded? yeTo be honest, think calmly, yeAbout why they, ye
Are making such a fuss, ye”“Not enough time, yeThis is homework, homework, yeIf you can't solve this, then your problem is ddaeng”“Thank you for ignoring us until nowThank you Stadium Dome BillboardThanks to you we became successful”“Friends from small companiesI hope you all become big soon”The members also seem to really love it! This clip is from their 5th Muster last year and even though the song is a rapline song (and also not on Spotify 😭) all the members performed the song! (+Also rapper JK is back!)  DDAENG is my favorite hidden gem from BTS and I think everyone should give it a chance. If it's not for you that’s okay too :) But it’s definitely for me so I just had to share!

This …well you should try it yourself as I don't know what type of songs You like in particular (energetic love songs, motivational etc) I'll suggest - not today - energetic song #fightingTheOdds Epiphany - mood uplifter Love myself- name itself tells that this song is just for you to feel good about yourself. Magic shop - catchy and Sweet song (abstract feels) Tear - “my concentration song” idkw but I solve physics problems easily when I listen to this song Ddaeng- if you like rap. This song gives the essence of Korea and China basically east Asia infused with rap ♡ Spring Day - great music and you'll certainly feel more attached to good memories . ~ f i n ~ (#myVeryUnsatisfactoryAnswer)
